ing: 2 cups long grain rice, rinsed and drained
des: "This delicious, simple coconut rice adds an exotic touch to any meal!  Especially great with fish such as salmon."
ins: In a medium saucepan, combine rice, onion, coconut milk, water, ginger, curry powder, and salt. Cover, and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 20 to 30 minutes, or until done.
